numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In all 4 data sets, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
3. In Major League Soccer, the number of head coaches of color reaches a peak in 2020.
4. I wonder about the data for 2021 so far.
5. The data shows diversity in national sports teams.
6. The data should make us wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color than players of color.
7. The headline is: Does the sport determine the diversity of a team and a coach?
